item.title: Led Zeppelin - Rock And Roll

item.title: Led Zeppelin - Immigrant Song
item.description:
Ah ah ah ah
Ah ah ah ah
I’ve come from the
land of the ice
and snow
From the midnight
sun where the
hot springs
flow Come
out of the cold
Would drive
our ships to
new lands
And fight the hoards
And sing
and cry
Valhalla
I am coming
Always sleep with the
flashing arc I’ll
only go where things
are worse than shown
Ah ah ah ah
Ah ah ah ah
I’ve come from the
land of the ice
and snow
From the midnight
sun where the
hot springs
flow Such a
feeling so green
The whispered
tales of
Thor Of how he’d
come in times of war
We are your
overlords
Always sleep with the
flashing arc I’ll
only go where things
are worse than shown
So now you’d better
stop And rebuild
all your ruins
For peace and trust
can win
the day
Despite of
all your losing

Ooooh oooh ooooh

when you walk that way
